パッケージ jooq.sys.routines

  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    CreateSynonymDb
    Description Takes a source database name and synonym name, and then creates the synonym database with views that point to all of the tables within the source database.
    Diagnostics
    Description Create a report of the current status of the server for diagnostics purposes.
    ExecutePreparedStmt
    Description Takes the query in the argument and executes it using a prepared statement.
    ExtractSchemaFromFileName
    Description Takes a raw file path, and attempts to extract the schema name from it.
    ExtractTableFromFileName
    Description Takes a raw file path, and extracts the table name from it.
    FormatBytes
    Description Takes a raw bytes value, and converts it to a human readable format.
    FormatPath
    Description Takes a raw path value, and strips out the datadir or tmpdir replacing with @@datadir and @@tmpdir respectively.
    FormatStatement
    Description Formats a normalized statement, truncating it if it is > 64 characters long by default.
    FormatTime
    Description Takes a raw picoseconds value, and converts it to a human readable form.
    ListAdd
    Description Takes a list, and a value to add to the list, and returns the resulting list.
    ListDrop
    Description Takes a list, and a value to attempt to remove from the list, and returns the resulting list.
    PsIsAccountEnabled
    Description Determines whether instrumentation of an account is enabled within Performance Schema.
    PsIsConsumerEnabled
    Description Determines whether a consumer is enabled (taking the consumer hierarchy into consideration) within the Performance Schema.
    PsIsInstrumentDefaultEnabled
    Description Returns whether an instrument is enabled by default in this version of MySQL.
    PsIsInstrumentDefaultTimed
    Description Returns whether an instrument is timed by default in this version of MySQL.
    PsIsThreadInstrumented
    Description Checks whether the provided connection id is instrumented within Performance Schema.
    PsSetupDisableBackgroundThreads
    Description Disable all background thread instrumentation within Performance Schema.
    PsSetupDisableConsumer
    Description Disables consumers within Performance Schema matching the input pattern.
    PsSetupDisableInstrument
    Description Disables instruments within Performance Schema matching the input pattern.
    PsSetupDisableThread
    Description Disable the given connection/thread in Performance Schema.
    PsSetupEnableBackgroundThreads
    Description Enable all background thread instrumentation within Performance Schema.
    PsSetupEnableConsumer
    Description Enables consumers within Performance Schema matching the input pattern.
    PsSetupEnableInstrument
    Description Enables instruments within Performance Schema matching the input pattern.
    PsSetupEnableThread
    Description Enable the given connection/thread in Performance Schema.
    PsSetupReloadSaved
    Description Reloads a saved Performance Schema configuration, so that you can alter the setup for debugging purposes, but restore it to a previous state.
    PsSetupResetToDefault
    Description Resets the Performance Schema setup to the default settings.
    PsSetupSave
    Description Saves the current configuration of Performance Schema, so that you can alter the setup for debugging purposes, but restore it to a previous state.
    PsSetupShowDisabled
    Description Shows all currently disable Performance Schema configuration.
    PsSetupShowDisabledConsumers
    Description Shows all currently disabled consumers.
    PsSetupShowDisabledInstruments
    Description Shows all currently disabled instruments.
    PsSetupShowEnabled
    Description Shows all currently enabled Performance Schema configuration.
    PsSetupShowEnabledConsumers
    Description Shows all currently enabled consumers.
    PsSetupShowEnabledInstruments
    Description Shows all currently enabled instruments.
    PsStatementAvgLatencyHistogram
    Description Outputs a textual histogram graph of the average latency values across all normalized queries tracked within the Performance Schema events_statements_summary_by_digest table.
    PsThreadAccount
    Description Return the user@host account for the given Performance Schema thread id.
    PsThreadId
    Description Return the Performance Schema THREAD_ID for the specified connection ID.
    PsThreadStack
    Description Outputs a JSON formatted stack of all statements, stages and events within Performance Schema for the specified thread.
    PsThreadTrxInfo
    Description Returns a JSON object with info on the given threads current transaction, and the statements it has already executed, derived from the performance_schema.events_transactions_current and performance_schema.events_statements_history tables (so the consumers for these also have to be enabled within Performance Schema to get full data in the object).
    PsTraceStatementDigest
    Description Traces all instrumentation within Performance Schema for a specific Statement Digest.
    PsTraceThread
    Description Dumps all data within Performance Schema for an instrumented thread, to create a DOT formatted graph file.
    PsTruncateAllTables
    Description Truncates all summary tables within Performance Schema, resetting all aggregated instrumentation as a snapshot.
    QuoteIdentifier
    Description Takes an unquoted identifier (schema name, table name, etc.) and returns the identifier quoted with backticks.
    StatementPerformanceAnalyzer
    Description Create a report of the statements running on the server.
    SysGetConfig
    Description Returns the value for the requested variable using the following logic: 1.
    TableExists
    Description Tests whether the table specified in in_db and in_table exists either as a regular table, or as a temporary table.
    VersionMajor
    Description Returns the major version of MySQL Server.
    VersionMinor
    Description Returns the minor (release series) version of MySQL Server.
    VersionPatch
    Description Returns the patch release version of MySQL Server.
